channel.description: Pro Vision Lighting is a leading supplier of LED, HID, and Laser lighting solutions. Over 20 years of expertise in automotive lighting and electrical industry. Committed to delivering professional-grade solutions at competitive prices.

item.title: LED Work Light | Driving Lights | 6 Inch 40w
item.description: Compact All-round LED Work Lights Driving Lights - Two for One Deal. The best features of the 6 40w led lights is that they are perfect for putting on the front of vehicles to give that extra punch of clear white light, and they are only 38mm high so they are suitable for areas with limited space. The optical engineering in the 6 40w led lights are designed to give you distance and width, and they produce 3200 Lumens per light. Built to withstand general working environments, our compact 6 led lights are an affordable choice for buying a reliable work light/driving light that will get the job done. Slim Work/Driving Lights Built for Distance and Width. Coined the Elip Beam, the 6 40w will give you a smooth beam pattern that promotes a better visual range out the front of the vehicle, as well as to each side, making them a perfect compact and effective lighting solution. Powerful 5w High Intensity led s will ensure long life and high brightness, which means the 6 40w is a good investment for those needing to get more light where you need it the most, and without any light degradation over a short period of time. We also include a free relay harness and switch in the price, if you need them, but the low current draw, (3amps), allows you to easily replace existing lights and still utilise the wiring you already have. Call us for free advice about your application, from cars to trucks, to mining and agricultural machinery, we have the expertise and solutions to help you get the right led light for what you need to achieve, at the right price. A quick breakdown of the key features of the 6 40w led work lights and driving lights Genuine High Intensity LED s. 3200 Lumen Per Light, (6400lm for a Pair or nearly twice as bright as standard halogen bulbs). Durable Polycarbonate Lens, Vibration Resistant, and IP57 Weatherproofing. Advanced Combination Elip Beam for better distance + width. 5500k Pure White for Maximum Optical Clarity. Free and Fast Air Express Delivery. Free Relay Harness Switch if Needed. Heavy Duty Stainless Steel Brackets Bolts. Australian Backed 12 Month Warranty. A Great Little Universal Work Light or Driving Light

item.title: BLACK DIAMOND 5 Inch LED Driving Lights with High Intensity LED's.
item.description: The Best 5 LED Driving Lights. Pro Vision Lighting has tested a lot of small led driving lights over the years, and in our opinion, the best 5 inch led driving light right now are our compact 80W Black Diamond Series driving lights. Why? Engineered with the latest hybrid optics, an advanced thermal management system, and high-intensity LED s, the Black Diamond 5 inch led spotlights/driving lights, will give you the maximum amount of light while still maintaining the integrity of the led s for up to 100,000hrs. (Hybrid lenses are a combination of both distance width). We also provide you with a free relay harness and switch, free clear covers, free flood covers. Everything you need is included in the price. The Same Quality as Some Driving Lights but at Half the Price. You can pay an exorbitant amount of money for a good quality led driving light, but after being in the industry for more than 20yrs, we have taken the hard work out of selecting a set of driving lights that are high performance and reasonably priced. Built with the latest technology, and coupled with a state-of-the-art thermal management system make the black diamond 5 inch driving lights a great deal. For those wanting a reliable, long lasting, and compact led driving light that adds that extra punch on the road while driving at night give the 5 black diamond series a go. With a range of free extras included in the price, you can t go past the value for money that s on offer for the black diamond 5 driving lights. Call or email us for free advice, from cars to trucks, to mining and agricultural machinery, we have the best solutions and expertise to meet your demands. Key Features of the Black Diamond 5 Driving Lights. You can go over the specifications tab for more information, but to give you a quick breakdown of the features, see the information below. Genuine High Intensity LED s. 8000 Lumen Per Light, (16,000lm for a Pair). Virtually Unbreakable Polycarbonate Lens. 1LUX@600mtrs. Free and Fast Air Express Delivery. Free Relay Harness Switch. Free Clear Protective Lens Covers. Free Interchangeable Flood Lens Covers. Free High Beam **Quick-Fit Adapters if needed. Heavy Duty Stainless Steel Brackets Bolts. Vibration Resistant Rubber Dampening Mat. 5yr Warranty. Compact, Powerful, High Quality! **Quick-Fit Adapters. We recommend that you get a qualified auto electrician to modify the relay harness to trigger the lights through a high beam connector. Not all electrical systems are the same, quick-fit adapters are universal in that they are a simple power and earth connector. Some headlight connectors can not only be polarity sensitive, but some are negatively switched. We advise letting an auto electrician make up their own adapter for you.

item.title: 22 Inch PRO Series LED Light Bars with Precision Parabolic Reflectors.
item.description: 22 Professional-Grade 120W LED Light Bar - Built for Power Durability High-Performance LED Lighting for Maximum Visibility The GEN3 Pro Series 22 LED Light Bar is engineered for exceptional brightness, durability, and efficiency. Unlike standard light bars using 5W LEDs, this model features advanced 10W Osram LEDs. Designed for off-road enthusiasts, heavy-duty applications, and commercial use, it ensures enhanced visibility in all conditions. Precision Optics Multi-Mount System Custom parabolic reflector lenses provide an intense, evenly spread beam with optimal width distance coverage. Multi-bracket mounting system includes side brackets a sliding base mount for flexible installation. Virtually unbreakable polycarbonate lens is scratch-resistant impact-proof for long-lasting clarity. Built to Withstand Harsh Environments IP67-rated for water dust protection. Military-grade breathers maintain internal pressure stability at high/Low altitudes. Advanced Thermal regulation prevents overheating ensures stable operation. High-vibration shock-resistant for use on off-road vehicles, trucks, and industrial machinery. Key Features High-performance 10W Osram LEDs for superior brightness and efficiency. Precision-engineered beam pattern eliminates scattered light glare. Wide voltage range (9-30V DC) suits cars, trucks, 4WDs, and work vehicles. Instant full illumination with no warm-up time required. EMC to prevent interference with radios or electronic signals. UV Rated Comprised of MAR Paint Technology protecting the lightbar against corrosion, fading, and cracking. Price Includes a relay harness switch. Price Includes shipping Australia-wide - price includes GST. 5-Year Australian-backed warranty for guaranteed reliability performance. Why Choose Pro Vision Lighting? Trusted by Thousands - Verified 5-Star Trustpilot Google Reviews. Industry Experts - Over 20 years of experience in automotive lighting solutions. Money-Back Guarantee - Confidence in every purchase. Need Assistance? Contact Us Today! Call: 1300 775 359 for expert advice. Email: Send us an inquiry - sales@pro-vision-lighting.com.

item.title: 45 Inch PRO Series LED Light Bars with Precision Parabolic Reflectors.
item.description: 45 Professional Grade, Heavy Duty LED Light Bars with Precision Reflector Lenses.The Pro Series LED Light Bars have some unique features making them one of the most popular and attractive choice for savvy buyers.Mulit-Bracket Mounting System.Having the ability to adjust the rigid side mounts gives the fitter the option to extend the length of the light bar to suit the mounting placement and not have to worry about if the lightbar is too long or too short.The Pro Series also come with 360 deg. rotational L Foot side mount brackets for mounting in different positions in grills, on bars, or on roofs, and they also come with base mounts on a sliding rail for easy fitting to bull bars with pre-existing mounting holes.Reflectors.Advanced engineering in the parabolic reflectors give you an intense, but evenly spread, beam of light, and they are available in an All Spot, All Flood , or a Combination Beam of Spot + Flood , making them versatile for a wide range of uses. Weatherproofing and Environmental Protection.The Pro Series Light Bars are IP68 Ingress rated for complete water and dust proofing, have advanced thermal management for protection of critical systems in high and low temperatures, are UV Rated and comprise MAR Paint Technology so that they will last for years in the Australian sun without flaking or fading, they have Military Breathers for pressure equalization in high and low altitudes, and High Vibration Resistance - 15Grms 24-2000hz, Shock: 12G-8hrs Non-Stop Logarithmic Testing for harsh environments.The Pro Series Light Bars are a stylish and heavy duty light bar that are just as comfortable driving on long dark highways in your late model car, or for off-road 4x4 adventure enthusiasts, or for on work machines in the mining and farming industry. On or Off the road the Pro Series LED Light Bars will give you 100% Satisfaction Guaranteed.45 Inch LED Light Bar Information for those who need to know the ins-and-outs and every little detail.There is a massive amount of information you can learn about light-bars. I will go over some common questions below, but if you need more specific information on your light bar queries call us in Australia on +61 (2) 9698 2543.What about the set-up if i want to hook them up to come on with the high beams?You can get high beam adapters for the light bars from us free of charge, just let us know you need them, but...because electrical systems vary so much with so many different types of vehicles on the market, we suggest getting an auto electrician to fit the light bar for you and let them make up their own switching connections, for your particular vehicle. Why? because if you get standard adapters, say, for a H4 connector, the adapter may not work properly if you have a negatively switched vehicle, or other types of electrical systems, this is why it s always best to get your light bar fitted by a professional who has fitted led light bars previously.Whats the best type of lens configuration in the 45 Inch?Ok, so this is a biggie, as the old saying goes, horses for courses , in saying that, this Pro Series Light Bar is probably the highest quality universal light bar i have personally seen that doesn t cost an arm and leg, and you can pretty much configure them to get distance, width, and depth.These days you are getting Hybrid lenses that have optical and parabolic properties, but you also have to take into account the type of led that is being used, as the led s themselves have specific optical directional properties, so in other words, simply putting the brightest led you can buy into your light bar does not mean you are going to get the most out of them, the lenses must work in conjunction with the type of led to get the best result.Why do some light bars interfere with the radio?One of the reasons that lightbars interfere with radios is because radios can be earthed on the body, and some led light bars are mounted on the body and therefore the radio picks up electromagnetic interference from them through the earth.A couple of solutions is to either make sure your light-bars components are shielded so as not to give off electromagnetic interference, (which are Pro Series have), or make sure your lights are shielded where you mount them.I have also seen where radios are earthed in the same vein as the headlights, so they can pick up the interference through the system.This is generally only affecting AM stations, and you will find that that it can increase the noise the further away from towns you get.You can also use radio suppressors on cabling lines, or use EMC decoders, (little match box size suppressors you can add to your cabling.In most cases, a good quality led light bar will have built-in EMC so you won t get this problem, but on some older vehicles, you might find a few problems you have to deal with.Call us for free advice about fitting led light-bars to your Car, Truck, Motorcycle, or Quad bike. We have the expertise and solutions to give you the righ

item.title: Triple Stack 7 Inch LED Headlights | **Directors Pick.
item.description: Powerful 7 Inch 105w LED Headlights with DRL + Amber Indicator. RRP $220.00. Sale Price Only While Stocks Last - Directors Pick! Express Delivery Australia Included.The 105w 7 is a powerful and easy to fit led headlight that directly replaces any 7 semi-sealed, or sealed beam headlight on cars, trucks, and motorcycles.They have Built-In EMC and Can-Bus decoders for suppressing electromagnetic interference and can-bus decoding for vehicles that have an automatic lighting system controlled by the computer. They work on Can-Bus and Non-Can-bus controlled vehicles.The 105W has an integrated Amber indicator function built into the DRL s that switch from normal white daytime running lights to an amber flashing indicator that can be hooked up to be activated by your blinker. You don t have to hook up this function if you do not want to.The lights have a triple row of precision-engineered projector lenses and use Genuine High-Intensity LED s.Note** Price includes Air Express Worldwide Freight. OEM Cross Reference Applications. H6024 Cross Reference: 6014 / 6015 / 6017 / 6016 / H5024 / H6014 / H6017 / H6026 / 2D1, 875 3132905, A27 38416, A27 6014, A27 6024, A27 H5064, A27 H6017, A27 H6024, A63 6014, A63 H5024, A63 H6017, A63 Cross Reference: H6017LL, A63 H6024, A63 H6024H, A63 H6024LL, BAM 2110154, COK H6024, FON 65007, FRL 42002922, FRL 42002948, FRL 42006172, FRL 42006179, FRL 42009804, FRL 42024164, FRL 42031936, IMP 81564, SYL 86024, SYL H6024, SYL H6024XV, W38 6014, W79 6014, W79 6017, W79 H6017, W79 H6024, W82 6014, W82 H6024, WAG 6014, WAG H6024. ***Note: All LED Headlights have an easy fit plug and play Headlight connector, meaning they plug straight into your existing headlight connector without any extra wiring needed. In the case of Earth Switched Vehicles, (Negatively switched vehicles), you can get plug-and-play polarity converters and 50w resistors to solve polarity or load issues that some vehicles have, (if you are not sure, get your local auto electrician to check). **Note: By law, a qualified automotive electrician is required to do any electrical work to a vehicle. Not all vehicle electrical systems are created equal, so as professionals we advise that you get an auto electrician to fit your lights to alleviate any unforeseen variances your vehicle s electrics may have. TIPS FOR FITTING LED HEADLIGHTS Check these tips before buying led headlights. For More Info Click the Link - How do I Fit LED Headlights to an Earth-Switched Vehicle?

item.title: Pro Series 7 Inch LED Headlights | No Halo
item.description: PRO SERIES - 7 Inch LED Headlamp with Built-In DRL/Position Light. ADR COMPLIANT: Universal Symmetrical Beam Pattern suitable for Australian roads. ECE, EMark. KEY FEATURES: 9-16V (12v Compatible). Built-In Can-Bus Compatibility. H4 H/L Connector. 2-3x Brighter than normal lights but with Low Glare Technology. Better illumination, 5700k Pure White for better Optical Clarity, advanced illumination parameters for better light area coverage that creates a safer night driving experience, and a Stylish design with a built-in Position Light/DRL//Parker Light.MATERIALS: Virtually Indestructible PMMA Lens with 96% Transparency, UV-Cured Reflectors, and Veil. Genuine High Intensity LED s - high brightness, low glare, and a long life with no dimming over a short period of time.FREE FREIGHT: Price Includes air express delivery Australia-wide. The price includes GST, with no hidden extra charges.WARRANTY: 5yr Australian Backed Warranty.Tried Tested Performance.Our Pro Series lights have been tried and tested over time and are available in different configurations - No Halo (this listing), Full Halo, Half Halo, and Quarter Halo, (See other configurations below in Related Products ).The DRL, (or position light), is built into the low beam so you do not have to cut any wires, simply plug them into your existing H4 H/L connector and away you go.Each light is available in a black or chrome finish and is backed by an Australian 5yr warranty. Tried Tested, Versatile, Tough OEM Cross Reference ApplicationsH6024 Cross Reference: 6014 / 6015 / 6017 / 6016 / H5024 / H6014 / H6017 / H6026 / 2D1, 875 3132905, A27 38416, A27 6014, A27 6024, A27 H5064, A27 H6017, A27 H6024, A63 6014, A63 H5024, A63 H6017, A63 Cross Reference: H6017LL, A63 H6024, A63 H6024H, A63 H6024LL, BAM 2110154, COK H6024, FON 65007, FRL 42002922, FRL 42002948, FRL 42006172, FRL 42006179, FRL 42009804, FRL 42024164, FRL 42031936, IMP 81564, SYL 86024, SYL H6024, SYL H6024XV, W38 6014, W79 6014, W79 6017, W79 H6017, W79 H6024, W82 6014, W82 H6024, WAG 6014, WAG H6024.Toyota Landcruisers, Jeeps, Nissan Patrols, Harleys, Kenworths. Any Car, Truck, or Motorcycle with a standard 7 Sealed Beam.***Note: All LED Headlights have an easy fit plug and play Headlight connector, meaning they plug straight into your existing headlight connector without any extra wiring needed. In the case of Earth Switched Vehicles, (Negatively switched vehicles), you can get plug and play polarity converters and 50w resistors to solve polarity or load issues that some older Landcruiser and Hilux vehicles have, (if you are not sure, get your local auto electrician to check). **Note: By law, a qualified automotive electrician is required to do any electrical work to a vehicle. Not all vehicle electrical systems are created equal, so as professionals we advise that you get an auto electrician to fit your lights to alleviate any unforeseen variances your vehicle s electrics may have.TIPS FOR FITTING LED HEADLIGHTSCheck these tips before buying led headlights. item.title: 34 Inch PRO Series LED Light Bars with Precision Parabolic Reflectors.
item.description: 34 Professional Grade, Heavy Duty LED Light Bars with Precision Reflector Lenses. The Pro Series LED Light Bars have some unique features making them one of the most popular and attractive choice for savvy buyers.Mulit-Bracket Mounting System.Having the ability to adjust the rigid side mounts gives the fitter the option to extend the length of the light bar to suit the mounting placement and not have to worry about if the lightbar is too long or too short.The Pro Series also come with 360 deg. rotational L Foot side mount brackets for mounting in different positions in grills, on bars, or on roofs, and they also come with base mounts on a sliding rail for easy fitting to bull bars with pre-existing mounting holes.Reflectors.Advanced engineering in the parabolic reflectors give you an intense, but evenly spread, beam of light, and they are available in an All Spot, All Flood , or a Combination Beam of Spot + Flood , making them versatile for a wide range of uses. Weatherproofing and Environmental Protection.The Pro Series Light Bars are IP68 Ingress rated for complete water and dust proofing, have advanced thermal management for protection of critical systems in high and low temperatures, are UV Rated and comprise MAR Paint Technology so that they will last for years in the Australian sun without flaking or fading, they have Military Breathers for pressure equalization in high and low altitudes, and High Vibration Resistance - 15Grms 24-2000hz, Shock: 12G-8hrs Non-Stop Logarithmic Testing for harsh environments.The Pro Series Light Bars are a stylish and heavy duty light bar that are just as comfortable driving on long dark highways in your late model car, or for off-road 4x4 adventure enthusiasts, or for on work machines in the mining and farming industry. On or Off the road the Pro Series LED Light Bars will give you 100% Satisfaction Guaranteed. 34 Inch LED Light Bar Information for those who need to know the ins-and-outs and every little detail. There is a massive amount of information you can learn about light-bars. I will go over some common questions below, but if you need more specific information on your light bar queries call us in Australia on +61 (2) 9698 2543. What about the set-up if i want to hook them up to come on with the high beams? You can get high beam adapters for the light bars from us free of charge, just let us know you need them, but...because electrical systems vary so much with so many different types of vehicles on the market, we suggest getting an auto electrician to fit the light bar for you and let them make up their own switching connections, for your particular vehicle. Why? because if you get standard adapters, say, for a H4 connector, the adapter may not work properly if you have a negatively switched vehicle, or other types of electrical systems, this is why it s always best to get your light bar fitted by a professional who has fitted led light bars previously. Whats the best type of lens configuration in the 34 Inch? Ok, so this is a biggie, as the old saying goes, horses for courses , in saying that, this Pro Series Light Bar is probably the highest quality universal light bar i have personally seen that doesn t cost an arm and leg, and you can pretty much configure them to get distance, width, and depth.These days you are getting Hybrid lenses that have optical and parabolic properties, but you also have to take into account the type of led that is being used, as the led s themselves have specific optical directional properties, so in other words, simply putting the brightest led you can buy into your light bar does not mean you are going to get the most out of them, the lenses must work in conjunction with the type of led to get the best result. Why do some light bars interfere with the radio? One of the reasons that lightbars interfere with radios is because radios can be earthed on the body, and some led light bars are mounted on the body and therefore the radio picks up electromagnetic interference from them through the earth.A couple of solutions is to either make sure your light-bars components are shielded so as not to give off electromagnetic interference, (which are Pro Series have), or make sure your lights are shielded where you mount them.I have also seen where radios are earthed in the same vein as the headlights, so they can pick up the interference through the system.This is generally only affecting AM stations, and you will find that that it can increase the noise the further away from towns you get.You can also use radio suppressors on cabling lines, or use EMC decoders, (little match box size suppressors you can add to your cabling.In most cases, a good quality led light bar will have built-in EMC so you won t get this problem, but on some older vehicles, you might find a few problems you have to deal with. Call us for free advice about fitting led light-bars to your Car, Truck, Motorcycle, or Quad bike. We have the expertise and solutions to give yo

stations, and you will find that that it can increase the noise the further away from towns you get.You can also use radio suppressors on cabling lines, or use EMC decoders, (little match box size suppressors you can add to your cabling.In most cases, a good quality led light bar will have built-in EMC so you won t get this problem, but on some older vehicles, you might find a few problems you have to deal with.Call us for free advice about fitting led light-bars to your Car, Truck, Motorcycle, or Quad bike. item.title: 50 Inch PRO Series LED Light Bars with Precision Parabolic Reflectors.
item.description: 50 Professional Grade, Heavy Duty LED Light Bars with Precision Reflector Lenses.The Pro Series LED Light Bars have some unique features making them one of the most popular and attractive choice for savvy buyers.Mulit-Bracket Mounting System.Having the ability to adjust the rigid side mounts gives the fitter the option to extend the length of the light bar to suit the mounting placement and not have to worry about if the lightbar is too long or too short.The Pro Series also come with 360 deg. rotational L Foot side mount brackets for mounting in different positions in grills, on bars, or on roofs, and they also come with base mounts on a sliding rail for easy fitting to bull bars with pre-existing mounting holes.LED s.Premium Grade High Intensity LED s are also a feature of the Pro Series, they produce 170lm/w, and have a lifespan of 100,000hrs, without and significant illumination degradation.Reflectors.Advanced engineering in the parabolic reflectors give you an intense, but evenly spread, beam of light, and they are available in an All Spot, All Flood , or a Combination Beam of Spot + Flood , making them versatile for a wide range of uses. Weatherproofing and Environmental Protection.The Pro Series Light Bars are IP68 Ingress rated for complete water and dust proofing, have advanced thermal management for protection of critical systems in high and low temperatures, are UV Rated and comprise MAR Paint Technology so that they will last for years in the Australian sun without flaking or fading, they have Military Breathers for pressure equalization in high and low altitudes, and High Vibration Resistance - 15Grms 24-2000hz, Shock: 12G-8hrs Non-Stop Logarithmic Testing for harsh environments.The Pro Series Light Bars are a stylish and heavy duty light bar that are just as comfortable driving on long dark highways in your late model car, or for off-road 4x4 adventure enthusiasts, or for on work machines in the mining and farming industry. On or Off the road the Pro Series LED Light Bars will give you 100% Satisfaction Guaranteed.50 Inch LED Light Bar Information for those who need to know the ins-and-outs and every little detail.There is a massive amount of information you can learn about light-bars. I will go over some common questions below, but if you need more specific information on your light bar queries call us in Australia on +61 (2) 9698 2543.What about the set-up if i want to hook them up to come on with the high beams?You can get high beam adapters for the light bars from us free of charge, just let us know you need them, but...because electrical systems vary so much with so many different types of vehicles on the market, we suggest getting an auto electrician to fit the light bar for you and let them make up their own switching connections, for your particular vehicle. Why? because if you get standard adapters, say, for a H4 connector, the adapter may not work properly if you have a negatively switched vehicle, or other types of electrical systems, this is why it s always best to get your light bar fitted by a professional who has fitted led light bars previously.Whats the best type of lens configuration in the 50 Inch?Ok, so this is a biggie, as the old saying goes, horses for courses , in saying that, this Pro Series Light Bar is probably the highest quality universal light bar i have personally seen that doesn t cost an arm and leg, and you can pretty much configure them to get distance, width, and depth.These days you are getting Hybrid lenses that have optical and parabolic properties, but you also have to take into account the type of led that is being used, as the led s themselves have specific optical directional properties, so in other words, simply putting the brightest led you can buy into your light bar does not mean you are going to get the most out of them, the lenses must work in conjunction with the type of led to get the best result.Why do some light bars interfere with the radio?One of the reasons that lightbars interfere with radios is because radios can be earthed on the body, and some led light bars are mounted on the body and therefore the radio picks up electromagnetic interference from them through the earth.A couple of solutions is to either make sure your light-bars components are shielded so as not to give off electromagnetic interference, (which are Pro Series have), or make sure your lights are shielded where you mount them.I have also seen where radios are earthed in the same vein as the headlights, so they can pick up the interference through the system.This is generally only affecting AM stations, and you will find that that it can increase the noise the further away from towns you get.You can also use radio suppressors on cabling lines, or use EMC decoders, (little match box size suppressors you can add to your cabling.In most cases, a good quality led light bar will have built-in EMC so you won t get this problem, but on some older vehicles, you might find a few p

Why Choose Pro Vision Lighting? With over 20 years of experience in automotive lighting, Pro Vision Lighting is dedicated to providing high-quality products at a reasonable price. Our 3-year warranty and positive customer reviews give you the confidence that our globes are reliable and long-lasting. Contact Us For any inquiries, call 1300 775 359, send us an email, or make your purchase through our secure online store. Key Features Benefits: Rapid Ignition Technology: The advanced igniter allows the globes to reach full brightness much faster than standard globes, ensuring optimal visibility sooner. UV Cut Quartz Tubes: These tubes offer better optical clarity, enhanced durability, and a longer lifespan. They are also safer for the eyes of oncoming drivers and won t damage your headlight lenses. Direct Replacement: This is suitable for all D3S headlight globe brand upgrades, including Osram, Philips, Harrison, and more. ADR Approved: ECE, EMC, CE, DOT, RoHS Certified for safety and quality. item.title: HID Xenon Bulbs | High Powered 100w. H1, H3 H7, H9, H11, 9005, 9006.
item.description: HIGH POWERED HID BULBS.Our range of universal high powered after-market HID Bulbs are professionally engineered with UV Cut Quartz glass so as not to burn or damage reflectors and lenses.All the bulbs are a True Colour xenon bulb which means they are clear and pure and will give you a crystal vision and they are available in 100w, (compatible with 100w hid ballasts).The HID Bulbs also generate more light than most standard after-market hid bulbs and their colour temperatures are also steady and are not dull and will not fade with use.The hid bulbs are available in all colour temperature ranges, but we list the 6000k Pure white to cool white, (which are the most popular), and we also list the 4300k warm white as well. If you would like a different colour temperature for a show car or other application you can request it in add additional information in the selection section when purchasing, or call us for more information.*** Please Note. a High Kelvin Rating Does Not Mean They Are Brighter. 4000k-6500k are the brightest. Less than 4000k, and above 6500k you start to lose light depth. Have a Look at the BULB COLOUR CHART. You want a light closest to Midday Sunlight for the best light for seeing the contrast of objects at night.The main available bulb types are H1, H3, H7, H9, H11, HB3 9005, HB4 9006. If you require another bulb type call us for more information.The bulbs have a 5yr limited warranty, or 5000hrs operating life (whichever comes first).*** Also Note, 100w are for Off-Road Use Only. A 100W HID is equal in brightness to a 450W Halogen. You cannot use these lights on low beam on the main roads.The price includes Overnight Express Delivery in Australia in 1-2 business days, and International Air Express 3-5 business days. Professional Quality!

item.title: HID Ballasts | Fast Start | Pro Series 12v, 35w & 55w.
item.description: Fast Start Pro Series HID Ballasts.The Pro Series Fast Start hid ballasts are the fastest starting ballasts in the world today. They are 12V AC/DC compatible ballasts that have an available power output rating of either 35w or 55w, and they carry a 5yr warranty.The advantages of having the Fast Start Ballasts is that they are almost instantaneous to full brightness when you switch them on, this is particularly helpful when your turn off high beam for passing traffic, and then switch high beam back on again and get to full brightness so you can clearly when driving on long dark highways at night.The fast start have anti-flicker by way of the advanced circuitry and are AC/DC compatible. The Fast Start Ballasts have universal connectors that are compatible with most after-market ballasts so that they can be easily used as a replacement for any after-market hid kits that need a replacement ballast.The Fast Start ballasts come with brackets or bolts, and are IP68 water and dust tight.The Price Includes Overnight Express Delivery in Australia in 1-2 business days, and International Air Express 3-5 business days. Fastest Starting HID Ballasts in the World!

item.title: HID Ballasts | Can-Bus + Fast Start | Pro Series | 12v 55w.
item.description: Can-Bus + Fast Start Pro Series HID Ballasts.The Pro Series Can-Bus compatible hid ballasts are for vehicles where the lights turn on automatically. These systems are usually found on high end vehicles that turn the lights on when you turn the ignition on, when you go through a dark tunnel, or if they turn on automatically at dusk. Can-Bus means Controller Area Network , and the vehicles computer controls the lights for some of the lights functions. The computer does this by picking up the resistance of the filament in the halogen bulb. The Pro Series can-bus ballasts we provide work on can-bus controlled, and non can-bus controlled systems.The Can-Bus compatible ballasts have an available power output rating of either 55w, have incorporated Fast Start Technology, and they carry a 5yr warranty.They have anti-flicker technology, and advanced computer chips, and are AC/DC compatible.Each Can-Bus Ballast has universal connectors that are compatible with most after-market ballasts, and can be easily used as a replacement for any after-market hid kits that need a replacement ballast.Our Can-Bus are IP68 water and dust tight.The Price Includes Overnight Express Delivery in Australia in 1-2 business days, and International Air Express 3-5 business days. Advanced Can-Bus + Fast Start Technology

item.title: HID Ballasts | High Powered |12v 100w.
item.description: High Powered HID Ballasts.The high-powered HID Ballasts are 100w and 12v compatible.Our 100w ballasts are absolute monsters in power output and will produce around 10,000 lumen each with the 100w bubs.Each 100w ballast are a multi-volt 9-32v ballast which means they are suitable for 12v or 24v vehicles.100 Watt Ballasts are generally used to upgrade driving lights and spotlights, but can also be used for high beam headlight ballast upgrades, as they still get to full brightness relatively quickly because of the high-quality chips in them.Our 100w ballasts have been carefully selected and tested to give you the best-engineered products available today. We have tried many 100w ballasts, (beware of fake ballasts claiming to be 120w or 150w, they are fake), and have found a lot of 100w ballasts to be unreliable, and they can cause serious problems to the vehicle.The 100w ballasts have a 5yr warranty and are a proven reliable and long-lasting solution for any heavy-duty or high-powered illumination requirements. Super Bright!, Super Reliable

item.title: Relay Harness for LED and HID Driving Lights and Light Bars
item.description: Relay Harness for LED Light Bars and HID and LED Driving Lights, and Work Lights.The Pro Vision Lighting relay harnesses are engineered to give you a wide range of application choices at a low price and without compromising on quality, and they are delivered to you fast door to door in 1-2 days to any capital city in Australia, or 5-7 working days worldwide.The wiring harnesses are suitable for HID and LED Driving Lights, LED Light Bars, and for Work Lights, and they are available in a single cable for one light or a dual cable for two lights, (you can also get a quote for cables for 3 or 4 lights upon request, and Free High Beam Quick Fit Adapters if required, just tell us to add them in Write In Additional Instructions and let us know your high beam bulb type H4, or HB3 9005, H9 etc...).The wiring harness comes with a rocker switch and Deutsch connectors and can be used on driving lights up to 100W HID, light bars up to 52 , and any work light.The relay is fully waterproof and rated at 40amps, the rocker switch is rated at 20amps, they are available in 12v or 24v for cars, trucks, and machinery.Price Includes Overnight Express Delivery 1-2 Working Days in Australia, or International Air Express Delivery 5-7 working days worldwide At Extra Cost .NOTE*** You can also get High Beam Quick Fit Adapter Kits with your relay harness for Free upon request. These are for connecting lights to your high beam switch on your vehicles headlight connector, but we Do Not recommend them , and cannot guarantee they will work on your electrical system. Vehicles have different electrical systems, (such as negative switching systems), so we recommend getting your local auto electrician to fit them, as they can connect your lights up to high beam easily without the quick fit kits. Call us in Australia on 1300 775 359 for more information. Professional Grade!

item.title: Quickfit Gen2 LED Headlight Globes
item.description: Wireless GEN2 Quick-Fit Headlight Globes for Cars Trucks.The Quick-Fit GEN2 are the upgraded versions of our original quick-fit kits. Suitable for Cars, Trucks, Motorcycles, the latest quick-fit kits have had a major overhaul and their performance is outstanding.What I like about them most is that they are so easy to fit. Just pull out the old bulb, put the new quick-fit in, and that s it! No mounting drivers, no worries about tying down cabling, the GEN2 Quick fit are a true simple plug play unit. The other thing is the power, the Quick-Fit GEN2 are like putting in an HID, but without the Glare!If you are looking for a no-mess-no-fuss solution to brightening up your headlights then give the Quick-Fit GEN2 led globes a go. Plug Play Power! Quick-Fit GEN2 Overview Summary.CAN-BUS COMPATIBLE: In themselves, the quick-fit will work on 90% of vehicles as-is with no flicker, noise, or error codes. In some rare cases, you may need to add extra can-bus decoders which we can add to your kit for Free if they are needed. If you are not sure give us a call and we can go over it with you.HEADLIGHT TYPE COMPATIBILITY: The Quick-Fit GEN2 LED s are a super bright second generation led that will work in Reflector Lenses and are also suitable for the more advanced Projector Lenses.GEN2 LED S: The second generation Philips Luxeon Z ES chips now produce more lumen/watt and have a longer life with less illumination degradation over time. More light, a longer life, and better durability.PLUG PLAY: The Quick-Fit have built-in original termination points so that you can simply plug in your existing headlight connector just as you would with your original halogen bulb.COMPACT: Built to replace normal halogen bulbs, the quick-fit are no broader or deeper than your original globes, but are 3x brighter and last 100x longer.HYBRID COOLING TECHNOLOGY: The evolution of thermal management has gone from fans, to copper braids, to conduction and heat dissipation through the body. The latest hybrid cooling systems have now come full circle and have rolled the previous technologies into one. Convection is now through liquid + copper cores and thermally engineered aviation-grade aluminium bodies. Coupled with the intelligent temperature control system and virtually noiseless Japanese *smart fan technology, the Quick-Fit led headlight globes are kept relatively cool in any environment and will last for up to 100,000 hours with minimal light illumination degradation over time.Professional Grade.Pro Vision Lighting has been in the auto electrical supply industry for over 20yrs. Our quick-fit led globes are a high performance easy-to-fit led bulb that carries a 3-year warranty and a money-back guarantee. When we first brought these onto the market we priced them for $169/set retail. The quick-fit led globes have performed so well in 2019 we are keeping them on for 2020 at a discount.Check List Tips for Buying LED Headlight BulbsIs there anything i need to know before I buy led headlight bulbs?If you need to, click the link below and go through the information or give us a call on 1300 775 359.Before Fitting LED Bulbs to Headlights Checklist.Which LED Headlight Bulb Fits My Car?Check your manual or call your dealer with your VIN number. You can also have a look at the Bulb Application Guide on the OSRAM site to see if you can find a listing for your vehicle. Some globes will have the part number written on them, or you can send us a photo and we can identify it for you.

item.title: Pro Vision Lighting™ | 7 Inch LED Headlights | Pro Series GEN2
item.description: Professional Grade 80w 7 Inch LED Headlamp with DRL - ADR Compliant for Australian Roads. RRP $269.00. Sale Price Only While Stocks Last. The Second Generation Pro 80w 7 is an LED headlight that directly replaces any 7 sealed beam, or semi-sealed beam headlight on cars, trucks, and motorcycles.Each headlamp is ADR Approved, has built-in EMC and Can-Bus decoders for anti-electromagnetic interference and works with any computer-controlled automatic headlight functions.With virtually unbreakable polycarbonate lenses and the latest in advanced optical engineering, the Pro 80W gives you a brighter, clearer field of vision, has twice the illumination of a standard halogen headlight but is low glare to not impede drivers when passing oncoming traffic, and will not scratch or break under the harshest of conditions.Each light has an OEM H4 H/L connector + H13 H/L adapter for easy fitting, and an extra wire that you can hook up to the parkers to use the DRL/Park light function.The Pro 80W looks fantastic and performs exceptionally well on cars, trucks, and motorcycles, and can choose them in chrome or black finish to match your vehicle.Note** Price includes GST and Air Express Delivery. OEM Cross Reference Applications. H6024 Cross Reference: 6014 / 6015 / 6017 / 6016 / H5024 / H6014 / H6017 / H6026 / 2D1, 875 3132905, A27 38416, A27 6014, A27 6024, A27 H5064, A27 H6017, A27 H6024, A63 6014, A63 H5024, A63 H6017, A63 Cross Reference: H6017LL, A63 H6024, A63 H6024H, A63 H6024LL, BAM 2110154, COK H6024, FON 65007, FRL 42002922, FRL 42002948, FRL 42006172, FRL 42006179, FRL 42009804, FRL 42024164, FRL 42031936, IMP 81564, SYL 86024, SYL H6024, SYL H6024XV, W38 6014, W79 6014, W79 6017, W79 H6017, W79 H6024, W82 6014, W82 H6024, WAG 6014, WAG H6024. ***Note: All LED Headlights have an easy fit plug and play Headlight connector, meaning they plug straight into your existing headlight connector without any extra wiring needed. In the case of Earth Switched Vehicles, (Negatively switched vehicles), you can get plug and play polarity converters and 50w resistors to solve polarity or load issues that some vehicles have, (if you are not sure, get your local auto electrician to check). **Note: By law, a qualified automotive electrician is required to do any electrical work to a vehicle. Not all vehicle electrical systems are created equal, so as professionals we advise that you get an auto electrician to fit your lights to alleviate any unforeseen variances your vehicles electrics may have. TIPS FOR FITTING LED HEADLIGHTS Check these tips before buying led headlights. For More Info Click the Link - How do I Fit LED Headlights to an Earth-Switched Vehicle?

item.title: 4 Inch 55W HID Spotlights & Driving Lights - Red Trim.
item.description: 4 Inch 55 Watt HID Spotlights and Driving Lights with Red Trim.Super powerful and a tried and tested performer, the 4 Inch 55W are available in a Spot, Euro (A euro beam is a driving beam. euro beams can be classed as a wide beam or spread beam), or you can get a combination of 1x spot and 1x euro. We have listed them for purchase Per Light, 1x light is One Piece, 2x lights will be a Pair. Some clients, like roo shooters, will only require one light to set up on their racks so we have this option for your convenience.What Do I Get With The Lights?Each light comes with everything you need and there are no hidden costs. You get a free relay harness and switch, the cost of freight is included in the price, you get free clear protective covers, and you get all the mounting brackets and accessories included with the lights.Why Better Engineering Matters.Some key requirements for the less expensive hid lights are that the housings are a high-grade ABS and that the components, (bulbs and ballasts), are good quality. There are cheaper lights available that look the same, but take it from us, there are a few problems that you cannot see from the outside.The first thing is the quality of the ABS. The material engineering has to be of a high grade so that the plastic is not too brittle or become brittle after exposure to sunlight. Most cheap products have bad material plastics that will not withstand harsher conditions over an extended period of time. We use a high-grade ABS housing that will withstand corrugated roads and withstand damaging UV radiation from the sun.The other couple of parts you don t see are the bulbs and ballasts. First of all, to get good current stability you need an AC/DC compatible ballast that has a good warranty, (ours are tried and tested and we give you a 3yr warranty on them). The ballasts are also critical for regulating the power to the bulbs correctly so as to give the globe an extended lifespan. The globes we use are UV Cut Quartz so as to not burn or damage reflectors and lenses, (low-grade globes make lenses smoky and reduce visibility and can also burn reflectors reducing there reflectivity). The xenon gas and pressure cylinders in an HID globe must be high grade so that the colour temperature remains stable and produce a consistent optically clear light. Quality globes last longer, give you better optical clarity and reduce eye fatigue.A quick breakdown of the key features of the 4 55W HID Driving Lights and Spotlights.Genuine ABS: Engineered to endure corrugated roads and UV protection against material break-down.Super Bright, Super-Efficient: Powerful internal AC/DC 55W HID Ballasts producing 5500 Lumen of light. Equal in brightness to a 225W halogen globe but only using the same amount of power as a 55w halogen bulb. More than 1km of illumination.Advanced Optical Clarity: Our globes are the latest high-grade xenon bulbs and are available in 4300k warm white or 6000k cool white. A stable lighting effect for better visual clarity and reducing eye fatigue.Size: 4 - H150x W145x D130mm.Voltage: 12v or 24v Available.Free and Fast Air Express Delivery: Generally within 2-3 weeks depending on location.Warranty: Australian Backed 3yr Warranty. Amazing Light Output for Their Size

item.title: Extreme PLUS G3 LED Globes. 18,000 Lumen (P18) - BRIGHTEST.
item.description: Third Generation Extreme PLUS (P18 G3 Series) LED Headlight Globe Replacements. CAN-BUS COMPATIBILITY: The Extreme PLUS G3 Series (P18 - 18,000lm), have the latest engineering technology in their micro-drivers that are can-bus compatible in over 98% of vehicles with an automatic lighting system, (vehicles where your lights switch on automatically). The EXTP G3 are also compatible with all older vehicles that need more load resistance and all non can-bus controlled vehicles.BRIGHTNESS: Better illumination leads to a safer driving experience. The G3 produce an amazing 18,000 Lumen and are specially designed with the latest advances in optical engineering to produce a kelvin rating that is closest to midday sunlight. Scientists tell us that our eyes are best adapted to see the contrast of objects at around the midday sunlight spectrum. Modern optical lighting engineers are reproducing this midday sunlight kelvin rating in the latest and highest quality products to give you the best possible visible clarity when driving on or off the road at night. The other important factor for the G3 is that they are low glare, so even though they are technically brighter than a 35w HID bulb, they will not blind people coming the other way.EASY FIT PLUG PLAY: You don t have to worry about any re-wiring, cutting wires, or having to drill holes in your dust cap with the EXTP G3. Each bulb is custom designed to fit into the smallest of housings and plug straight into your existing headlight connector. The base is only 37.5mm in diameter and is only the same depth on the base as your old halogen bulbs, around 35mm, (H4 H/L are a bit bigger - 45mm deep). Also, the micro-driver is only 15mm thick, and built into the high heat rated cable, so you can easily tuck everything neatly inside the smallest automotive headlight cavities.HYBRID THERMAL MANAGEMENT: The evolution of thermal management has gone from fans, to copper braids, to conduction and heat dissipation through the body. The latest hybrid cooling systems have now come full circle and have rolled the previous technologies into one advanced system for maximum effect. Convection is now through liquid + copper cores and thermally engineered aviation grade aluminum bodies. Coupled with the intelligent temperature control system and virtually noiseless Japanese *smart fan technology, the G3 led bulbs are kept relatively cool in any environment and will last for up to 100,000 hours with minimal light degradation over time.G3 Extreme PLUS Professional Grade LED Headlight Bulb Solutions.Pro Vision Lighting has been in the auto electrical supply industry for over 20yrs. Our third generation extreme plus series are a high performance led headlight globe built for serious car enthusiasts and automotive professionals. The G3 carry a 3-year warranty and a money back guarantee. High Performance Professional Grade LED Headlight Globes Check List Tips for Buying LED Headlight BulbsIs there anything i need to know before I buy led headlight bulbs?If you need to, click the link below and go through the information or give us a call on 1300 775 359 in Australia for more information.Before Fitting LED Bulbs to Headlights Checklist.Which LED Headlight Bulb Fits My Car?Check your manual or call your dealer with your VIN number. You can also have a look at the Bulb Application Guide on the OSRAM site to see if you can find a listing for your vehicle. Some globes will have the part number written on them, or you can send us a photo and we can identify it for you.

item.title: LED H4 Polarity Converter
item.description: H4 H/L LED Polarity Converter for Headlights.The polarity converters make it so much easier than having to re-wire your headlights original wiring.Converting earth switched vehicles headlight wiring when you upgrade older vehicle headlights, such as Hilux and Landcruiser, (around 98-2005), is a lot easier now thanks to the universal polarity converters.Earth switched vehicles are kind of not normal , in that the headlights H4 H/L connector has a common terminal, low beam terminal - earth, high beam terminal - earth. An actively switched H4 headlight connector has earth, active low beam, and active high beam, (Over 80 out of 100 sales of our led headlights have not needed polarity converters).If you are not sure if you need polarity converters, get your local auto electrician to check your electrical system to be certain. Making Life Easy!

item.title: H1 LED Headlight Bulbs
item.description: Third Generation H1 Extreme PLUS (G3 Series) LED Headlight Bulbs. COMPATIBLE WITH ALMOST ALL HEADLIGHT ELECTRICAL SYSTEMS: The H1 Extreme PLUS G3 Series has the latest engineering and are compatible with over 90% of vehicles that have an automatic lighting system, (vehicles where your lights switch on automatically).The G3 is also compatible with older vehicles that need more load resistance, and 100% of All Non can-bus controlled vehicles, (ordinary headlight systems). SUPER BRIGHT BUT WITH LOW GLARE: Better illumination leads to a safer driving experience, and the G3 produce an amazing 10,000 Lumen on low or high beam and are specially designed with the latest advances in optical engineering to react perfectly inside projector lens headlamps or reflector lens headlamps.The colour temperature, (kelvin rating), is closest to midday sunlight, (almost pure white), with which scientists tell us that our eyes are best adapted to see the contrast of objects clearly and give us the best clarity of vision for safer night driving.The other important factor for the G3 is that they have a low glare filter film on the led, so even though they are technically as bright a 35w HID bulb, they will not blind people coming the other way. EASY TO FIT AND A COMPACT DESIGN: You don t have to worry about any re-wiring, cutting wires, or having to drill holes in your dust cap with the EXTP G3.Each bulb is custom-designed to fit into the smallest of housings and plug straight into your existing headlight connectors.The base of the H1 G3 is only 37mm in diameter, and only 38mm deep.The driver is built into a high heat rated cable with easy fit, plug play terminals to easily connect into your existing headlight connectors. HYBRID THERMAL TECHNOLOGY FOR A LONG LIFE IN ANY ENVIRONMENT: The evolution of thermal management has gone from fans, to copper braids, to conduction and heat dissipation through the body.The G3 have the latest hybrid cooling system.Thermal management has now come full circle, rolling all the previous technologies into one advanced system for maximum efficiency and effectiveness.Convection has now advanced tremendously with the G3 s liquid + copper cores and thermally engineered aviation-grade aluminium bodies.Coupled with the intelligent temperature control system and noiseless Japanese *Smart Fan technology, the G3 led bulbs are kept cool in any environment and will last for up to 100,000 hours with minimal light degradation over time. Professional Grade LED Headlight Bulb Solutions. Pro Vision Lighting has been in the auto electrical supply industry for over 20yrs. Our third-generation extreme plus series are a high performance led headlight globe built for serious car enthusiasts and automotive professionals.The G3 carry a 3-year warranty and a money-back guarantee. High Performance, Professional-Grade, and Easy to Fit . Check List Tips for Buying LED Headlight Bulbs Is there anything i need to know before I buy led headlight bulbs?If you need to, click the link below and go through the information or give us a call on 1300 775 359 in Australia for more information. Before Fitting LED Bulbs to Headlights Checklist. Which LED Headlight Bulb Fits My Car? Check your manual or call your dealer with your VIN number. You can also have a look at the Bulb Application Guide on the OSRAM site to see if you can find a listing for your vehicle. Some globes will have the part number written on them, or you can send us a photo and we can identify it for you.

In the case of Earth Switched Vehicles, (Negatively switched vehicles), you can get plug-and-play polarity converters and 50w resistors to solve polarity or load issues that some vehicles have, (if you are not sure, get your local auto electrician to check). **Note: By law, a qualified automotive electrician is required to do any electrical work to a vehicle.
